channel.title: Jeff Newmiller's Musings

item.title: Inaugural Post
item.description: I have been keeping a file of solutions to small data analysis problems I find on the internet on my computer, and thought it might be nice to be able to point people at them… which kind of leads to having a blog. You may find it dry reading if you are looking for juicy bits about my personal life though… I rarely feel the need to share in that way.

item.title: About
item.description: Jeff Newmiller is an engineer who uses R regularly and Python somewhat less regularly, and occasionally shares thoughts about data analysis here. This is a personal website built with the blogdown package. The theme is bootstrap4 from hugo-theme-bootstrap4-blog-master.
